details.value: A common exercise in creative computation classes I’ve taught is to give students a simple input, and see how they can transform it to generate some visual output. Being far removed from school at this point, I figured it would be fun to give myself the input of the current time and create a few variations.

songsTitle: a clock where the time is in a song title

songsMethod.value: Created by Russell Samora. Data from the Spotify API.
Every minute, random songs are played that contain the time in the title (e.g., 6:47 or 6:47 from Central Station).
